Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 67th/St.Lawrence
ShortDescription: Eastbound 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 67th, St.Lawrence, Marquette, Cottage, and 67th due to, street blockage near 67th/St.Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 67th, St.Lawrence, Marquette, Cottage, and 67th due to, street blockage near 67th/St.Lawrence.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute near Madison/Loomis
ShortDescription: 20 Madison rrtd EB via Madsion, Ogden, Washington, Ada & Madison; WB via Madison, Ada, Randolph, Ogden & Madison due to fire dept. activity nr Madison/Loomis

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to fire department activity near Madison/Loomis.

  • Eastbound buses will operate via Madsion, Ogden, Washington, Ada and Madison.
  • Westbound buses will operate via Madison, Ada, Randolph, Ogden and Madison.

Allow extra travel time.
